content:
[ ] Read QR codes
[ ] Read barcodes
[ ] NFC
[ ] Bio reader
[ ] L-house version, integrated with L-house manager app
[ ] Client ID
[ ] Send tickets via wireless (mesh)/bluetooth/NFC
[ ] Accept crypto, from YN
[ ] Commerce can create promotions, sending ETH tickets according to a number of buys
[ ] Compatibility with OpenBazaar
[ ] Read client's ETH address, send ether/token/NFT/enjin to it (evolution of gift cards)
[ ] Support gov. Fiscal Note
[ ] Support pundi-x and other machines
[ ] Support Trezor, Ledger, Keydrive and others
[ ] Support Money Test
[ ] Easiest UI
title: Emporium .apps (Floflis 1.1)
